data.name: GDG DevFest Modesto & Berkeley
data.description: Hey GDGers, we know October is a long ways out, but we’re super excited to bring you the first DevFest to be hosted in Modesto (and our second partnering with GDG Berkeley)! Location is TBD, but the date will be October 19, 2019 so mark your calendars now and get ready for a day full of awesome tech…

relatedRecords.name: Global Azure Bootcamp - New Jersey
relatedRecords.description: Welcome to New Jersey - Azure Bootcamp! All around the world user groups and communities want to learn about Azure and Cloud Computing! On April 25, 2020, all communities will come together once again in the fifth great Global Azure Bootcamp event! #GlobalAzure! New Jersey will be participating i…

relatedRecords.name: Code BEAM SF
relatedRecords.description: Code BEAM SF is the only conference in the USA where we bring all the languages that run on the BEAM together. Discover how Erlang and Elixir are being used in industries and areas including IOT, Blockchain, Fintech, Security, Machine Learning and many more.
